question: The "1911 Revolution" happened in which nation?
explanation: The 1911 Revolution is also known as the Chinese Revolution or the Xinhai Revolution. This revolution overthrew China's last imperial dynasty, the Qing dynasty. This revolution leads to the abdication of Puyi, the last imperial ruler of China; end of imperial China; establishment of the Republic of China. This revolution happened from 10 October 1911 to 12 February 1912.
